meanings.definition: The act of being infested again.
meanings.sent1: After the exterminator left, the reinfestations of bugs started all over again.
meanings.sent2: The reinfestations of mice in the old house were a constant problem.
meanings.sent3: The reinfestations of ants seemed to throw a never-ending party in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The reinfestations of weeds in the garden were like an unstoppable army invading.
meanings.sent5: The reinfestations of mosquitoes made the summer nights unbearable.

meanings.definition: The presence of pests or parasites after they have been eradicated.
meanings.sent1: The reinfestations of bed bugs were a nightmare for the hotel owner.
meanings.sent2: Despite the thorough cleaning, the reinfestations of fleas kept coming back.
meanings.sent3: The reinfestations of lice in the classroom caused quite a stir among the students.
meanings.sent4: The reinfestations of termites in the wooden structure threatened the entire building.
meanings.sent5: The reinfestations of ticks on the pets were a constant battle for the owners.
